title: Organic dye-loaded reduced titanium dioxide as a broadband saturable absorber for ultrafast fiber lasers
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11728-11733
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08925H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xiaochan Lu, Shuang Li, Miao Yan, Jianming Chen, Tingting Deng, Guohui Nie, Zhenhong Wang, Hu Liang, Bin Zhang
In this study, the organic dye methylene blue (MB) is used as the dopant to modify TiO2−x to form TiO2−x-MB, which can be utilized as a saturable absorber (SA) in mode-locked fiber lasers at 1.55 μm and 2.0 μm for generating ultrashort pulses.
